document_data.name: ''Rune-Lined Skullcap''
document_data.location:
[[Sword Mountains]], [[Sword Coast North]]
[[Neverwinter]], [[Neverwinter Wood]]
[[Mere of Dead Men]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rune-lined skullcaps''''' were a type of [[enchanted]] headwear, inscribed in long-forgotten language, and received wider use in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Rune-lined skullcaps'' possessed minor enchantments that invigorated the wearer.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, various ''rune-lined skullcaps'' could be found among bandits and heroes of the [[Sword Mountains]], areas surrounding and markets of the city of [[Neverwinter]].
